nodes.text: This walled-off community on the planet Prine was the village that Maddie and Yan called home. While a majority of Prine's surface consisted of desert terrain, Maddie's home village was built on a hilly, grassy area which was usable for agriculture. Yan was killed and Maddie abducted by a gang of pirates after venturing outside the safety of the walls. However, the Human girl managed to return home on a bovid after being rescued by Jedi Dass Jennir.
